column4: is using nautilus' standard file moving functionality via copy & paste reliable (meaning that the destination file is guaranteed to be an exact copy of the source file, before the source file is deleted)? If not, what tool should I use instead? rsync?
nautilus would be rather useless if it didn't guarantee copies to be exact
agreed, but does it check via some hash or does it just assume that the underlying hardware does its job?
no, it won't do anything very exciting, I'm not sure if even rsync does
